mapper.select: SELECT ALC.alumni_circle_id, ALC.creator_id, ALC.alumni_circle_type, ALC.alumni_circle_name, ALC.alumni_circle_desc, ALC.avatar, ALC.authorization_status FROM alumni_circle AS ALC, alumni_circle_member AS ALCM WHERE ALC.alumni_circle_id = ALCM.alumni_circle_id AND ALCM.account_id = #{accountId};
